name: Terra Themes Tools
author: Terra Themes

sections.description:
The Terra Themes Tools plugin is meant to be used only with themes from Terra Themes. Other themes might not work with the extended features.

Terra Themes Tools registers custom post types (like Projects, Employees and more) with custom fields for themes from Terra Themes.
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins > Add New and search for Terra Themes Tools. Install and activate it.
  2. That’s it. No configuration needed.
sections.changelog:
1.5 | 03/14/2020

  • Changed stable tag
  • Removed unused height attribute from slider shortcode
  • Updated terra-themes-tools.pot file

1.4 | 09/24/2018

  • Added fallback if false slider transition type is set
  • Changed plugin description and tags
  • Changed some backend meta field styling
  • Changed slider arrow button url to use the same as the header image arrow button
  • Changed terra_themes_tools_get_attachment_thumb_url a bit
  • Improved the upload button function in meta fields
  • Updated terra-themes-tools.pot file

1.3.2 | 16/08/2018

  • Fixed escaping issue in video slide
  • Updated terra-themes-tools.pot file

1.3.1 | 08/03/2017

  • Removed Terra Slider height from shortcode, handled through theme now
  • Removed a doubled quotation mark

1.3 | 07/11/2017

  • Improved Terra Slider code
  • Updated terra-themes-tools.pot file

1.2 | 04/20/2017

  • Added option for responsive header slider
  • Added option for alt text (video poster/header image)
  • Improved data escaping
  • Removed the pause icon in the slider
  • Updated terra-themes-tools.pot file

1.1 | 03/24/2017

  • Added .smooth-scroll in slider shortcode output
  • Removed timeline post type
  • Updated terra-themes-tools.pot file

1.03

  • Improves post type registration
  • Code improvements

1.02

  • Fixed a small bug in the timeline metabox

1.01

  • Fixed a bug with the slide content

1.0

  • Initial version
